ComicInfo.Summary:
“City at War, Part 1.” The battle for control of New York City begins! As the city splinters into different human, mutant, and ninja factions, the TMNT find themselves in the middle of the chaos! Eight years of storytelling have led to this!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Dave Wachter | 1 | B | Cover B | Kevin Eastman (a) & Tomi Varga (c) | 2 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Cover | Dan Duncan | 3 | RE | AOD Collectables Exclusive Variant Cover | Oliver Castaneda | 4 | RE | Exclusive Variant Cover | Chris Campana & Ryan Browne | 5 | RE | IDW Convention Exclusive Variant Cover | Kevin Eastman (a) & Tomi Varga (c) | 6 |
